titles.title: To delay for 1 year the application of Revenue Ruling 2012-18 with respect to the characterization of payments as tips or service charges.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/31/2014--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of the Treasury from applying Revenue Ruling 2012-18 (or any similar guidance) for purposes of determining whether any payment made before January 1, 2015, is a tip as opposed to a service charge.
